name: NFT Jargon - Infographic 3.3 (SCIRZ Metacar Edition)
description:
NFT Jargon - Infographic 3.3 (SCIRZ Metacar Edition)

This token holder will have VIP/ front of line access to upcoming SCIRZ and Guild of Dreamers airdrops. This is a partnership with QueenEarth/ Guild of Dreamers and SCIRZ Metacar #ezxtz

We are growing a community of learners and educators, and this is the Tezos release. These tokens are supporting community onboarding, 1on1 Training, and professional development. From artists to businesses, we all need to learn to move around the metaverse. 
 
—---

This SCIRZ Metacar is derivative of the NFT Jargon Word Art and a growing collection of learning infographics.
https://objkt.com/asset/KT1H45qDRFbU6v3fH2TtMduKdTdLK2Z9ZCjs/16
 
Spend a few moments in any web space, and you will encounter words that you do not know. It is important to be informed and continue to introduce terms/topics. Knowledge is an asset. We must learn to speak the language. Take a look and ask questions. Find answers.
 
As soon as this is minted, it is out of date. There are certainly words that are missing or not even on our radar, yet. 

—----

About SCIRZ METACAR
A automobile Brand Created for Metaverse by Designer Gordon YONG and BK HAN.

"Passion for sport car design now made possible with NFT, Metaverse's first concept sport car brand SCIRZ METACAR is born."

“SCIRZ will be a brand created for Metaverse, rather than in the real world” said Gordon, and with NFT, he intend to build a community of sport car lovers who yet able to afford a real car but enjoy the feel of owning one.


Telegram: https://t.me/SCIRZMetacar
FB Page: https://www.facebook.com/SCIRZ-106133041942995
Opensea: https://opensea.io/collection/scirz-metacar
